original_text: Now when Abner returned to Hebron, Joab took him aside into an inner chamber, as if to speak with him privately. And there, to avenge the blood of his brother Asahel, Joab stabbed him in the stomach, and he died.
korean_text: 아브넬이 헤브론으로 돌아오매 요압이 더불어 조용히 말하려는 듯이 그를 데리고 성문 안으로 들어가 거기서 배를 찔러 죽이니 이는 자기의 동생 아사헬의 피로 말미암음이더라

sentences.original_text: Now when Abner returned to Hebron
Joab took him aside into an inner chamber
as if to speak with him privately
to avenge the blood of his brother Asahel
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 형제 아사엘의 피를 갚기 위해

sentences.original_text: Joab stabbed him in the stomach
